metadata.title: RZ/V2M: What is the difference between Linux BSP V1.2 and V1.3?

sections.content:
Question:
We are developing with Linux BSP V1.2.
V1.3 has been released as the latest environment. Is it necessary to update to the latest environment? What is the difference?
Answer:
Please review the r01an5971ej0130-rzv2m-linux.pdf release notes.
For details, see the list of change differences between V1.2 and V1.3 in Section 6.
Suitable Products
RZ/V2M
